short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install Linked pixel helper,to see if they have LinkedIn Insight Tags installed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔓 Unlock LinkedIn Conversion Insights: Install our Chrome extension to instantly check if websites have LinkedIn Insight Tags and optimize your campaigns for success. 🚀 
It is very important to get the right data and this tool will ensure that your LinkedIn Insight tags are not just there but working well. 🕵️‍♂️

Key Features of Linked Pixel Helper chrome extension🌟

Effortless Inspection: A user-friendly plugin will also make it simple to check your website for LinkedIn Insight tags even if you are a newbie. 🕵️‍♀️
Accurate Implementation Check: This plugin also ensures that LinkedIn Insight tags are added in the proper manner. It doesn’t raise any questions concerning tracking your data well. 🛠️
Streamlined Data Tracking: Use a tool that not only verifies but also assists with the smooth integration of LinkedIn Insight tags to help refine your marketing strategies and improve their accuracy. 📊

How to use LinkedIn Pixel Helper? 🛠️
🌐 Visit the Chrome Web Store.
🔍 Search for "Linked Pixel Helper" in the search bar.
🛒 Click on the extension in the search results, then click "Add to Chrome" to install it.
📌 After installation, the extension's icon should appear in your Chrome toolbar, typically near the address bar.
🚀 Click on the "Linked Pixel Helper chrome extension" icon to activate the extension.
🌐 Navigate to a webpage where you have implemented LinkedIn Insight Tags, and you want to monitor their activity.
📊 The extension should provide diagnostics for any installed LinkedIn Insight Tags by showing information about each of them.
🔧 Use the insights provided by the extension to optimize your campaigns for success on LinkedIn.
